verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1893"\w* he had \w ended|strong="G4137"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sayings|strong="G4487"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w audience|strong="G0189"\w* of the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, he \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w centurion’s|strong="G1543"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w dear|strong="G1784"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w was|strong="G2192"\w* \w sick|strong="G2560"\w*, and \w ready|strong="G3195"\w* to \w die|strong="G5053"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when he \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, he \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w beseeching|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3704"\w* he would \w come|strong="G2064"\w* and \w heal|strong="G1295"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w came|strong="G3854"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, they \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w instantly|strong="G4709"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w That|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2076"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* for \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he should \w do|strong="G3930"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w built|strong="G3618"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* a \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G0568"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w far|strong="G3112"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, the \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w friends|strong="G5384"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w trouble|strong="G4660"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4660"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w worthy|strong="G2425"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou shouldest \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w roof|strong="G4721"\w*:

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* thought \w I|strong="G0515"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0515"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w say|strong="G2036"\w* in a \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w servant|strong="G3816"\w* shall be \w healed|strong="G2390"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w set|strong="G5021"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w me|strong="G1683"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w one|strong="G5129"\w*, \w Go|strong="G4198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w goeth|strong="G4198"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w another|strong="G0243"\w*, \w Come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*, \w Do|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \add it\add*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, he \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w* at \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* turned him \w about|strong="G4762"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* that \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w I have|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w found|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w so great|strong="G5118"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G4102"\+w*, no, \+w not|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Israel|strong="G2474"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they that were \w sent|strong="G3992"\w*, \w returning|strong="G5290"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w found|strong="G2147"\w* the \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* \w whole|strong="G5198"\w* that had been \w sick|strong="G0770"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* the day \w after|strong="G1836"\w*, that he \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Nain|strong="G3484"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G2425"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* went \w with|strong="G4848"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* he came \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* to the \w gate|strong="G4439"\w* of the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w was|strong="G1580"\w* a dead \w man|strong="G2348"\w* carried \w out|strong="G1580"\w*, the \w only|strong="G3439"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w she|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w widow|strong="G5503"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w much|strong="G2425"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* of the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1492"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, he had \w compassion|strong="G4697"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Weep|strong="G2799"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w came|strong="G4334"\w* and \w touched|strong="G0680"\w* the \w bier|strong="G4673"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* they that \w bare|strong="G0941"\w* \add him\add* stood \w still|strong="G2476"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Young man|strong="G3495"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w Arise|strong="G1453"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he that was \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* sat \w up|strong="G0339"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w delivered|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w came|strong="G2983"\w* a \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* on \w all|strong="G0537"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w That|strong="G3754"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* is risen \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w visited|strong="G1980"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w rumour|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* went \w forth|strong="G1831"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the region round \w about|strong="G4066"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* of \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w shewed|strong="G0518"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* these \w things|strong="G5130"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w calling|strong="G4341"\w* \add unto him\add* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \add them\add* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Art|strong="G1488"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* he that should \w come|strong="G2064"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* look \w we|strong="G4328"\w* for \w another|strong="G0243"\w*?

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* the \w men|strong="G0435"\w* were \w come|strong="G3854"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w Baptist|strong="G0910"\w* hath \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Art|strong="G1488"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* he that should \w come|strong="G2064"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* look \w we|strong="G4328"\w* for \w another|strong="G0243"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* he \w cured|strong="G2323"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \add their\add* \w infirmities|strong="G3554"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w plagues|strong="G3148"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unto \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \add that were\add* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w* he \w gave|strong="G5483"\w* \w sight|strong="G0991"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Go your way|strong="G4198"\+w*, \+w and tell|strong="G0518"\+w* \+w John|strong="G2491"\+w* \+w what things|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w ye have seen|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w heard|strong="G0191"\+w*; \+w how that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the blind|strong="G5185"\+w* \+w see|strong="G0308"\+w*, \+w the lame|strong="G5560"\+w* \+w walk|strong="G4043"\+w*, \+w the lepers|strong="G3015"\+w* \+w are cleansed|strong="G2511"\+w*, \+w the deaf|strong="G2974"\+w* \+w hear|strong="G0191"\+w*, \+w the dead|strong="G3498"\+w* \+w are raised|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w to the poor|strong="G4434"\+w* \+w the gospel is preached|strong="G2097"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w blessed|strong="G3107"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+add he\+add*, \+w whosoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G4624"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w be offended|strong="G4624"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1698"\+w*.\wj*

¶ And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* the \w messengers|strong="G0032"\w* of \w John|strong="G2491"\w* were \w departed|strong="G0565"\w*, he \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \wj  \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w went ye out|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the wilderness|strong="G2048"\+w* \+w for to see|strong="G2300"\+w*? \+w A reed|strong="G2563"\+w* \+w shaken|strong="G4531"\+w* \+w with|strong="G5259"\+w* \+w the wind|strong="G0417"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w went ye out|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w for to see|strong="G1492"\+w*? \+w A man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w clothed|strong="G0294"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w soft|strong="G3120"\+w* \+w raiment|strong="G2440"\+w*? \+w Behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w they which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w gorgeously|strong="G1741"\+w* \+w apparelled|strong="G2441"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w live|strong="G5225"\+w* \+w delicately|strong="G5172"\+w*, \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w kings’ courts|strong="G0934"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w went ye out|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w for to see|strong="G1492"\+w*? \+w A prophet|strong="G4396"\+w*? \+w Yea|strong="G3483"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w much more than|strong="G4053"\+w* \+w a prophet|strong="G4396"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w This|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+add he\+add*, \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w it is written|strong="G1125"\+w*, \+w Behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w send|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w messenger|strong="G0032"\+w* \+w before|strong="G4253"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w face|strong="G4383"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall prepare|strong="G2680"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w way|strong="G3598"\+w* \+w before|strong="G1715"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4675"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Among|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w those that are born|strong="G1084"\+w* \+w of women|strong="G1135"\+w* \+w there is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w a greater|strong="G3187"\+w* \+w prophet|strong="G4396"\+w* \+w than|strong="G3187"\+w* \+w John|strong="G2491"\+w* \+w the Baptist|strong="G0910"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he that is least|strong="G3398"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w greater than|strong="G3187"\+w* \+w he|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* that \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add him\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w publicans|strong="G5057"\w*, \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, being \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* with the \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w* of \w John|strong="G2491"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lawyers|strong="G3544"\w* \w rejected|strong="G0114"\w* the \w counsel|strong="G1012"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w being|strong="G0907"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Whereunto|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w then|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w shall I liken|strong="G3666"\+w* \+w the men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w of this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w generation|strong="G1074"\+w*? \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w are they|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w like|strong="G3664"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w They are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w like|strong="G3664"\+w* \+w unto children|strong="G3813"\+w* \+w sitting|strong="G2521"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the marketplace|strong="G0058"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w calling|strong="G4377"\+w* \+w one to another|strong="G0240"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w We have piped|strong="G0832"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G3738"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w danced|strong="G3738"\+w*; \+w we have mourned|strong="G2354"\+w* \+w to you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2799"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w wept|strong="G2799"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w John|strong="G2491"\+w* \+w the Baptist|strong="G0910"\+w* \+w came|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w neither|strong="G3383"\+w* \+w eating|strong="G2068"\+w* \+w bread|strong="G0740"\+w* \+w nor|strong="G3383"\+w* \+w drinking|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w wine|strong="G3631"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye say|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w He hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w a devil|strong="G1140"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w The Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w is come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w eating|strong="G2068"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w drinking|strong="G4095"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye say|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w Behold|strong="G2400"\+w* \+w a gluttonous|strong="G5314"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w a winebibber|strong="G3630"\+w*, \+w a friend|strong="G5384"\+w* \+w of publicans|strong="G5057"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sinners|strong="G0268"\+w*!\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w wisdom|strong="G4678"\+w* \+w is justified|strong="G1344"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w her|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5043"\+w*.\wj*
